page.title: 19WEST HULL BIRDS EYE FACTORY
page.content: THE BIRDS EYE WALL'S FACTORY IS OWNED BY UNILEVER. THIS PLANT WAS BUILT IN 1967 AND SPECIALISES IN FISH PRODUCTS, PEAS, SPROUT AND ROOT CROP PROCESSING. MOST FISH NOW-DAYS IS IMPORTED IN FROZEN BLOCKS FROM ICELAND AND NORWAY, WHILST THE VEGETABLES ARE GROWN LOCALLY. THE FACTORY EMPLOYS 800 PEOPLE; ABOUT HALF ARE WOMEN WORKING PART-TIME SHIFTS ROUND THE CLOCK. THEY ARE PICKED UP BY SPECIAL BUSES EACH DAY. THE PRODUCTS ARE PROCESSED, AND FROZEN AND APPEAR IN THE FAMILIAR PACKS IN OUR SHOPS. PEA PRODUCTION SEEMS DELICATE. THEY ARE AT THEIR BEST FOR ONLY A FEW HOURS SO WHAT EVER TIME OF DAY, FARMERS RACE TO HARVEST THEM, AND LORRIES HURRY TO THE FACTORY FOR PROCESSING
